name: sasplanetj
short_description: A java-based light version of SAS.Planet map/satellite navigation application. Developed to work on mobile devices (WinCE, LinuxMobile). Supports multiple geo data sources (Google, Yandex, OpenStreetMap, VirtualEarth, WikiMapia, etc.). Uses cache of SAS.Planet.
